welcome_message_body: Welcome to Oharu, Japan! Known for its beautiful cherry blossom trees and rich cultural heritage, this charming city is ready to be explored and enjoyed by you. Embrace the unique sights, sounds, and flavors of Oharu as you make unforgettable memories here.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Komaki AFB Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Komaki AFB Airport is used for transporting goods and cargo.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights by low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A recently opened terminal used for international flights by low-cost carriers.
